refnamediv.refpurpose: proxy request to another host and return content to calling client

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function is used to retrieve content from a foreign host and send the response to the HTTP client of the page calling this. This is useful for re-routing a request to another server in the middle of a VSP page.

refsect2.title: host
refsect2.para: The fully-qualified host name or alias. If a target port is specified the semi-column ':' character MUST be used as the separator. ('www.foo.com:8080')

refsect2.title: header
refsect2.para: an array consisting of the HTTP request header lines. Warning: Each line MUST finish with <CR><LF> characters. This header lines will be sent to the target server without any conversion.

refsect2.title: content
refsect2.para: In the case of posting of forms this parameter can contain the form data as specified in HTML standards.
